section.heading: Establishment of lead-based paint abatement and control program

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary amendment of section, see § 101 of the Omnibus Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-124, July 27, 1995, 42 DCR 4160).

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 11-221 the “Lead-Based Paint Abatement and Control Act of 1996”, see Mayor’s Order 97-118, June 25, 1997 ( 44 DCR 4137).
